name: Slowtime
description:
Slowtime is a 3D puzzle game in FPS view. Face the different puzzles in which you will have to plan your actions. Project physical objects on the target and manipulate them with the slow motion.

This is a student project made during the final year of bachelor of game design at ICAN, Paris. There are few levels but the development is likely to evolve.

___________________________________________________________________________

FEATURES :

  • A unique and thrilling mechanic to master, the slow motion
  • 5 level of Onboarding to learn you the mecanics
  • 2 master level to test your skill
  • Emergent gameplay, you can solve the puzzles creatively

___________________________________________________________________________

CONTROLS (only mouse and keyboard) : 

Gameplay :

  • ZQSD to move
  • Left click to shoot
  • Right Click to permute
  • E to activate slow motion
  • Spacebar to jump
  • Shift to run

Debug : 

  • Enter to restart
  • N to go next level
  • M Disable ATH

___________________________________________________________________________
